thread.title: Netflix sets 'House of Cards' premiere for May 30
thread.title_full: Netflix sets 'House of Cards' premiere for May 30

author: USA TODAY
title: Netflix sets 'House of Cards' premiere for May 30
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Netflix sets 'House of Cards' premiere for May 30 Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright will return for Season 5 of the audacious political drama. Post to Facebook Netflix sets 'House of Cards' premiere for May 30 Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright will return for Season 5 of the audacious political drama. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/2jHT3VH Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Netflix sets 'House of Cards' premiere for May 30 Bill Keveney , USA TODAY 3:17 p.m. ET Jan. 20, 2017 Robin Wright, left, and Kevin Spacey play Claire and Francis Underwood on Netflix's 'House of Cards.' (Photo: David Giesbrecht, Netflix) 
On the day a real president is inaugurated, there's good news for fans of a fictional commander-in-chief. Netflix's House of Cards and its mesmerizing president, Francis Underwood (Kevin Spacey), will return for Season 5 on May 30. 
Friday's premiere announcement surfaced shortly after the inauguration and was accompanied by a foreboding video that features an American flag flying upside down, an official sign of distress. 
Netflix isn't revealing much about the new season of the Emmy-nominated drama, but its announcement offered one key detail: Francis and Claire Underwood (Robin Wright), "characters (that) have always been each other's strongest allies, show cracks in their relationship." 
House of Cards also stars Michael Kelly, Jayne Atkinson and Neve Campbell. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2jHT3VH NEVER MISS OUT Life Be a pop culture maven. Get the news, reviews and the juiciest celebrity stories that keep you in the know, Monday-Friday. THANKS FOR SIGNING UP FOR THE Life NEWSLETTER 
We're sorry.
